body.name: ErgoFocus Acrylic Monitor Stand Riser, Dual Monitor Stand with Adjustable Length and Angle, Clear Monitor Stand for 2 Monitors, 3 Shelf Monitor Stand Riser with Anti-Slip Mat for Computer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 52 mins
features: Monitor Stands for 2 Monitors: Increase productivity with our monitor stand riser that can accommodate 2-3 monitors, making it an ideal choice for when you need multiple computers to work together. Works on both laptops and desktops.

Angle and Length Adjustable: Customize your viewing experience with our angle and length adjustable monitor stand riser. Adjust the length from 23.3 inches to 35.4 inches and angle +/-90 degrees to find the perfect position for your visual needs.
Sturdy and Stable: Our computer stand is extremely sturdy and stable, with a maximum weight capacity of 44lbs, so you can work with confidence without worrying about collapsing or shaking during use.

Premium Quality: Our Monitor Stand Riser is crafted from 3 pieces of finely polished top acrylic, providing a crystal-like smooth touch. Its simple and stylish design is suitable for any style of home or office, making it a top-quality addition to your workspace.

Ergonomic Height: Improve your posture and reduce the risk of neck and eye-strain with our ergonomic design monitor stand. Raise your computer screen to a comfortable sight level for a better viewing experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-functional 3 Shelf Acrylic Monitor Stand Riser with Anti-Slip Mat ErgoFocus acrylic monitor stand consists of three pieces, providing multiple usage options: 1. Place two monitors on both sides and utilize the middle section for storing office supplies or decorations. 2. Position a monitor in the middle and use the remaining acrylic pieces as book or file organizers. 3. Set the monitor on one side and place a printer on the other. Discover even more features! Not only is our monitor stand riser sturdy and durable, but it is also adjustable to cater to your specific needs. Easily customize the angle and length for maximum comfort. No installation required; simply unpack and start using it right away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value, looks great. I got it to elevate my Cricut cutting machine and it fits the aesthetic of my living room and makes room underneath for storage. Win, win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s just so convenient!!! & looks great!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best desktop stand I’ve found. The fact that is acrylic made me jump at the chance for this stand as it will look good with literally any desk Which is great as I’m always changing my furniture. I absolutely love how it looks on my white craft desk and it’s given me so much extra space to put other things on top and underneath it and it looks soooooo good! It’s easy to put together and easy to move and rearrange if you needed. It’s sturdy and Im simply loving everything about it. I do think it’s worth the price and definitely worth getting if you need a desktop stand, this is the one to get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: product is as described, 3 separate acrylic stands, outside of the main stand the other 2 acrylic stands do not stand alone. other than that the product is great. Note, that most average-sized keyboards do not fit under the stands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good find.I bought this for my daughter's workstation in her room. The clarity of the monitor riser is as expected. But I was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy the risers were. These are quite thick, heavy duty. So they can actually support a good amount of weight. Also, the fact that they were clear did not make my daughter's workstation look more cluttered, while freeing up space underneath the monitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice acrylic monitor
reviews.reviewText: This acrylic monitor stand has given my computer monitors some height. They were easy to assemble right out the package. It looks amazing on my gaming desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty! 3/8” thickness
reviews.reviewText: Was very surprised to see how thick these are and they have some weight to them as well. Feels extremely durable overall and don’t see these flexing overtime. The stand came completely scratch free with 0 defects noticed in the acrylic. Just as clear as the glass tabletop.On the sides overall height adds right about 4” and in the middle it’s 3-5/8”. Inside diameter on the sides is approx 3-5/8” and middle is just above 3-1/4”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy simple platform to use for a dual display for my desk! I use a laptop/monitor for a dial screen set up. This was great to set my speakers on and my second monitor. It’s the perfect height that I needed! I’ve been sitting the monitor on a box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars durable and versatile
reviews.reviewText: I like how this can be used anywhere- it doesnt have to be to hold a monitor. I use it for my coffee station, so that i'm able to have 2 levels and this not only works but fits the bill. I like how you can adjust it to your liking. the acrylic is pretty too
